extendedInfo.description: Maintain birthdays and anniversaries!* Can be auto-synced with the contacts' notes and grab birthday data from Windows Mobile, Facebook, CSV, Phonebook, google.com/contacts.* Optional notifications.* Can maintain birthdays for people who are not contacts.* Calendar support with reminders.* Zodiac support (Western and Chinese).* Send SMS and e-mails.* Has a configurable widget.* Can read and write CSV files.* Supports MyBackup.* Multiple themes.* Allows for custom date types (date of death, name day).* Supports the Minimalistic Text app.* Optional Google Cloud backup.

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Lost notifications. See now app doesn\'t load at startup while on SD card. Still has the most features on the market
reviews.author: Grrgoyl Jones

reviews.title: Great! If you had my friend\'s and
reviews.comment: Families picture\'s on here everyone of the other birthday apps had that and they weren\'t even as good as you Guy\'s!\"\" Please put pics on here al I have is pics of my phone contacts :(
reviews.author: Sharon Hester

reviews.title: So handy!
reviews.comment: Have only had this app for 20min, & I\'m already in love! Birthdays & anniversaries in my calendar! WooHoo! Thank u dev!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: #1 Awsome
reviews.comment: Automatically syniced all facebook & phone contacts option to add annerversarys as well in 2 mins flat on Samsung Galaxy S2. Hope it does notifications still investigating otheriwse it is fantasic
reviews.author: Sharon Pulford

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Just discovered this app & felt like someone handed me a million dollars!  OK, maybe not THAT good but it\'s the best!  Makes keeping up with special days so simple!  Even updates the ages every year!  Thanks!
reviews.author: Chris M

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Since my Droid 4 upgraded(?) to jb I don\'t get auto notification. Used to use this app for all my friends & family birthdays & events, but because of this I missed a few :(  Can you fix? I would rate it 5
reviews.author: Bada Bing

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: Notifications stop working without any crash warning and contact import mismatches photo & info.
reviews.author: Krysta Chauncey-Allen

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: Love it!!! Wish it could get app2SD for my old N1 :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loose data
reviews.comment: What use is an app that looses all your data when u upgrade, and its done it to me twice? Bye.

reviews.title: Very good app, never forget what matters most...
reviews.comment: This app is to the point, simple and very useful, very nice implementation.

reviews.comment: Too good

reviews.title: Best birthday app available
reviews.comment: I\'m using it for years now...

reviews.comment: Keeps b\'days organised n keep u updated. A utility.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this for over a year with no problems. Changed phones (nexus 4) and now nothing works. Even the settings menu is incomplete! What a shame...

reviews.title: Facebook birthday\'s not showing
reviews.comment: Though option to sync facebook contact\'s is provided, they are not  displayed in list after sync

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best app...must have
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: It really is a great app, but if you have to get a new phone and reload this app it only saves dates that are connected to a contact. Others, such as baby bdays and anniversaries, are lost to the ages. I suggest a fix for that.
reviews.author: A Google User
